name: Little People's Art Studio
description: Let your child express themselves through art in this creative art class. This class promotes artistic cognitive development, linking tactile and visual fun in a casual environment. Adult participation is required.
fullDescription: Let your child express themselves through art in this creative art class. This class promotes artistic cognitive development, linking tactile and visual fun in a casual environment. Adult participation is required.
whatTheyOffer: Let your child express themselves through art in this creative art class. This class promotes artistic cognitive development, linking tactile and visual fun in a casual environment. Adult participation is required.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
